square_of_invertible:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/

theorem matrix.square_of_invertible (M : matrix n m R) (N : matrix m n R) (h : matrix.mul M N = 1)
    (h' : matrix.mul N M = 1) : fintype.card n = fintype.card m :=
  card_eq_of_lequiv R (matrix.to_linear_equiv_right'_of_inv h' h)
#align matrix.square_of_invertible matrix.square_of_invertible
